Interface CardRecipientRepository

    • findUserCardsNotInTrade

      @Query("SELECT uc.card FROM UserCard uc LEFT JOIN CardRecipient cr ON uc.card = cr.card AND cr.trade = :trade WHERE uc.user = :user AND cr.id IS NULL") List<Card> findUserCardsNotInTrade(@Param("user") User user, @Param("trade") Trade trade)

    • deleteByTradeAndCard

      @Modifying @Query("DELETE FROM CardRecipient cr WHERE cr.trade = :trade AND cr.card = :card") void deleteByTradeAndCard(@Param("trade") Trade trade, @Param("card") Card card)
